video_title: Are You Avoidant In Your Relationship? Top 4 Signs
transcript:
are you avoidant in your relationship
I'm Dr Julie and here's my top four
signs of an avoidant attachment style in
adult relationships number four when
your partner seeks intimacy with you the
barriers go up and the more they try to
get close the more you pull back number
three you hold back on starting new
relationships because it's so hard to
trust people number two you sometimes
end relationships to gain a sense of
freedom and number one you keep your
partner emotionally at arm's length
because it feels safer but they often
accuse you of being distant
